level.heading: Street, avenue, or public thoroughfare prohibited within 1,000 feet of Naval Observatory.
level.text: No street, avenue, or public thoroughfare in the neighborhood of the buildings erected upon the United States Naval Observatory grounds, Georgetown Heights, District of Columbia, shall extend within the area of a circle described with a radius of 1,000 feet from the center of the building known as the clock room of the said Observatory.

level.heading: CREDIT(S)
level.text: (Aug. 1, 1894, 28 Stat. 588, Joint Res. No. 40, ยง 1.)
